t: Amazon.com : LimbSaver unisex adult LimbSaver Grind to Fit Recoil Pad Standard Stocks Medium, 0, Medium US : Hunting Recoil Pads : Sports & Outdoors
s: This is probably my 10th grind to fit pad I have purchased over the past 5 years. I have short arms and have to cut my rifles to fit my length of pull. Easy to use, fit great, and it soaks up the recoil better than the original pads on the gun. Highly recommend Limbsaver brand.

t: Amazon.com : LimbSaver Snap-On Recoil Pad for 6-Position Adjustable Stocks, Black : Hunting Recoil Pads : Sports & Outdoors
s: Took my daughter and son to the ... DPMS Oracle with the LimbSaver pad, neither child (well, 18 & 19 year olds) could feel the recoil of the .223. Have put over 600 rounds through the gun since installing the pad, still looks and performs like brand new....
